summary: Build “Saudi Business Launchpad,” a SaaS platform and marketing website for Saudi entrepreneurs to start and manage businesses legally in KSA, providing guided business registration, compliance support (incl. VAT/ZATCA), operational setup help, resources, and mentorship/networking, with a modern, trustworthy, Saudi-aligned (Vision 2030) design and clear pricing/CTAs.
architectural_notes: Mobile-first, clean professional UI with Saudi-friendly palette (green/white/subtle gold) and trust-focused visuals
SEO-targeted content focused on Saudi business registration/compliance keywords
Tone: professional, trustworthy, clear, entrepreneur-friendly; align messaging with Saudi Vision 2030
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Modern Saudi-business themed hero illustration with abstract city/office elements in green/white with subtle gold accents (sbl-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
- Minimal outline icon: document/registration (sbl-icon-registration.dim_128x128.png)
- Minimal outline icon: shield/compliance (sbl-icon-compliance.dim_128x128.png)
- Minimal outline icon: growth/graph (sbl-icon-growth.dim_128x128.png)
- Minimal outline icon: mentorship/people (sbl-icon-mentorship.dim_128x128.png)
- Minimal outline icon: network/partners (sbl-icon-network.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive marketing website for “Saudi Business Launchpad” with top-level navigation and routes/pages for: Home, Services, How It Works, Pricing, Resources, Mentorship & Networking, About Us, and Contact / Get Started. All user-facing text must be in English.

Implement the Home page content with: headline “Start & Manage Your Business Legally in Saudi Arabia”, a short value proposition (including the provided durable hero text), primary CTAs “Get Started” and “Register Your Business”, and trust indicators emphasizing Saudi-focused, compliant, expert-backed positioning.

Build the Services page with clear sections/cards for: Business Registration Guidance, Regulatory Compliance Support, Operational Setup Assistance, VAT & ZATCA Compliance, and Licensing & Documentation Support.
Build the How It Works page showing a step-by-step flow: Step 1 “Choose Business Type”, Step 2 “Get Guided Registration”, Step 3 “Stay Compliant & Scale”.
Build the Pricing page with plan cards for: Free Plan (basic guidance), Pro Subscription (monthly and yearly options), Enterprise Plan, plus a Pay-per-service option section.

Build the Resources page with sections for: Business templates, Compliance checklists, Startup guides, and Knowledge base. Content can be presented as downloadable-looking cards/links (static for now).
Build the Mentorship & Networking page with sections describing: access to Saudi business mentors, a startup community, and a partner ecosystem.
Build the About Us page including mission (“Empower Saudi entrepreneurs”), Vision 2030 alignment, and an emphasis on local expertise & partnerships.

Build the Contact / Get Started page with a simple signup form that collects at minimum: full name, email, phone (optional), business stage/type (optional), and a message. Include WhatsApp and Email contact options (as links).

Add basic SEO and trust signals across the site: set per-page document titles/meta descriptions using the provided SEO keywords, and include a footer with consistent branding plus a lightweight disclaimer that content is guidance and not legal advice.

Apply a consistent visual design system matching the requested preferences: professional/modern, Saudi-friendly palette (green/white with subtle gold accents), clean typography, and trust-focused visuals (business/compliance/growth).

Generate and integrate required static visual assets (hero illustration + small icon set) into the frontend as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated, and use them in the UI (Home hero and trust/service cards).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create marketing website with core pages: Home, Services, How It Works, Pricing, Resources, Mentorship & Networking, About, Contact/Get Started
Home page content: headline, value proposition, primary CTAs (Get Started/Register), and trust indicators (Saudi-focused, compliant, expert-backed)
Services page sections for Business Registration, Regulatory Compliance, Operational Setup, VAT & ZATCA compliance, Licensing/Documentation support
How It Works page with step-by-step flow (Choose business type → Guided registration → Stay compliant & scale)
Pricing page with Free, Pro (monthly/yearly), Enterprise, and pay-per-service options
Resources section: templates, compliance checklists, startup guides, knowledge base
Mentorship & Networking section: mentor access, community, partner ecosystem
Contact/Get Started: simple signup form plus WhatsApp/Email contact options
Platform feature: guided business registration workflows tailored to Saudi-specific legal requirements
Platform feature: compliance support including reminders/alerts and expert support (incl. VAT/ZATCA)
Implement backend lead capture: store Contact/Get Started submissions in the Motoko canister with timestamp, and expose query methods to list submissions (admin/dev use).
